Award Reference ID. This is the Award Unique Identifier.

Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.
Set to True to disable editing and canceling the invoice inside the Workday application.   Invoice can only be updated from the web service.

Sub_Award.description: Indicates whether this Award is a sub-contracted award. If set to TRUE, specify a Prime Sponsor (Prime Sponsor was previously called Flow Through Sponsor).

Submit.description: Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.

Zero_Amount_Award.description: Indicates whether this award can have a zero amount value.
